description: From Middle English overweȝen; equivalent to over- +‎ weigh. First known attestation in the Ancrene Wisse ("luue ouerweið hit").

verbs.description: overweigh (third-person singular simple present overweighs, present participle overweighing, simple past and past participle overweighed)

entries.meaning: (transitive, archaic) To exceed in weight, outweigh; to preponderate; to weigh down.
